info.title: FHIR Conformance statement for Ontoserver®
info.description: An instance of Ontoserver implementing the HL7 FHIR terminology server specification.

servers.description: Ontoserver, The Australian e-Health Research Centre, CSIRO

/metadata.summary: Access to the Server's Capability Statement
/metadata.description: All FHIR Servers return a CapabilityStatement that describes what services they perform

get.summary: Return the server's capability statement

/AuditEvent.summary: Manager for resources of type AuditEvent
/AuditEvent.description: The Manager for resources of type AuditEvent: provides services to manage the collection of all the AuditEvent instances

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/Bundle.summary: Manager for resources of type Bundle
/Bundle.description: The Manager for resources of type Bundle: provides services to manage the collection of all the Bundle instances

get.summary: Search all resources of type Bundle based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: The ID of the resource

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Persistent identifier for the bundle

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: document | message | transaction | transaction-response | batch | batch-response | history | searchset | collection

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/Bundle/{rid}.description: Access to services to manage the state of a single resource of type Bundle

get.summary: Read the current state of the resource

put.summary: Update the current state of the resource

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

patch.summary: Change the current state of the resource by providing a patch - a series of change commands

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being patched

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

delete.summary: Delete the resource so that it no exists (no read, search etc)

204.description: If the resource is deleted - no content is returned

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/Bundle/{rid}/_history.summary: Read past versions of resource instance of type Bundle
/Bundle/{rid}/_history.description: Access to previous versions of a single resource of type Bundle

get.summary: Read the past states of the resource

parameters.name: _since
parameters.description: Only include resource versions that were created at or after the given instant in time

parameters.name: _at
parameters.description: Only include resource versions that were current at some point during the time period specified in the date time value (see Search notes on date searching)

parameters.name: _list
parameters.description: Only include resource versions that are referenced in the specified list (current list references are allowed)

/Bundle/{rid}/_history/{hid}.summary: Read a past version of resource instance of type Bundle
/Bundle/{rid}/_history/{hid}.description: Access a to specified previous version of a single resource of type Bundle

get.summary: Read a past state of the resource

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag for that version

/CodeSystem.summary: Manager for resources of type CodeSystem
/CodeSystem.description: The Manager for resources of type CodeSystem: provides services to manage the collection of all the CodeSystem instances

get.summary: Search all resources of type CodeSystem based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: The ID of the resource

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the code system

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: External identifier for the code system

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Computationally friendly name of the code system

parameters.name: publisher
parameters.description: Name of the publisher of the code system

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The current status of the code system

parameters.name: system
parameters.description: The system for any codes defined by this code system (same as 'url')

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The human-friendly name of the code system

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The uri that identifies the code system

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The business version of the code system

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/ConceptMap.summary: Manager for resources of type ConceptMap
/ConceptMap.description: The Manager for resources of type ConceptMap: provides services to manage the collection of all the ConceptMap instances

get.summary: Search all resources of type ConceptMap based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: The ID of the resource

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the concept map

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: External identifier for the concept map

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Computationally friendly name of the concept map

parameters.name: publisher
parameters.description: Name of the publisher of the concept map

parameters.name: source-code
parameters.description: Identifies element being mapped

parameters.name: source-system
parameters.description: Source system where concepts to be mapped are defined

parameters.name: source-uri
parameters.description: The source value set that contains the concepts that are being mapped

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The current status of the concept map

parameters.name: target-code
parameters.description: Code that identifies the target element

parameters.name: target-system
parameters.description: Target system that the concepts are to be mapped to

parameters.name: target-uri
parameters.description: The target value set which provides context for the mappings

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The human-friendly name of the concept map

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The uri that identifies the concept map

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The business version of the concept map

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

requestBody.description: The batch or transaction

summary.name: _summary
summary.description: Requests the server to return a designated subset of the resource

format.name: _format
format.description: Specify alternative response formats by their MIME-types (when a client is unable acccess accept: header)

pretty.name: _pretty
pretty.description: Ask for a pretty printed response for human convenience

elements.name: _elements
elements.description: Requests the server to return a collection of elements from the resource

count.name: _count
count.description: The maximum number of search results on a page. The server is not bound to return the number requested, but cannot return more
